system.description: This arm-mounted implant allows the character to carry a concealed weapon internally. This can be any pistol-sized weapon limited by tech level: stealth pistol, gyrojet pistol, gauss pistol, laser pistol, blaster pistol, or stunner. The weapon’s magazine capacity is half normal but can be reloaded normally via a retractable magazine holder. Internal weapons still suffer the DM-2 penalty to hit while in melee combat. The internal weapon’s price is Cr5000, plus twice the weapon’s cost. Internal weapons can be detected with medical scans or detailed physical inspections. Internal weapons are considered illegal on worlds with Law Level 4+.
